name: Friday's night music Battle
description:
in Friday's night music Battle Game , you will Find many Music Mods, Try to win this game by Tap The Right Note on the Right Position and Follow the Music Rhythm & Music! Also Playing Games , Dance and Listen to Music can boost your mood ; Right ? You can find all of theses in this Game
In this Game the Rhythm Should Matching the Music in order to Test your Reflexes and Musical Knowledge where you Need to Feel the Beat of the Music and Stay Focused .

HOW TO WIN ?
- Feel the Beats and Stay Focused.
- Make Arrows Perfectly Match.
- Defeat all Enemies, Climb to the Top Rank.

FEATURES :
- New Characters, Music and Background.
- Full of Different Modes and Enemies
- The arrows fall according to the FNF melody
- One-tap Control, Easy to Play
- You Can Choose other New Mods, Characters, Songs, and Difficulties.

TIPS TO MASTER :
- Hold, Drag to Aim and Shoot The Music Arrow
- Use just 1 Finger to Control

Have Fun and Enjoy the Game!
